catalog_info.title: Concepts in Development, Self-Renewal, and Repair
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as CB 721.0. For more information visit: Massachusetts General Hospital and select CB 226.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Upper division cell biology or equivalent.
catalog_info.description: Explores developmental mechanisms through the life cycle, contrasting pluripotency and cell fate restriction in embryos and adult tissues. In depth analysis of in vivo approaches, with emphasis on adult stem cells, tissue repair and self-renewal.
